page.title: 15A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: I am going to tell you about a typical day in my life in East Winch. Iam a boy of ten years of age and I live with my mum and dad in a bungalow in East Winch. I live on the opposite side of the main road to the school and there are about twenty other bungalows like ours where I live. All the children who live near us go to the primary school in East Winch except the older ones like my sister who goes to Gaywood Park High School in King's Lynn. After we have all had our breakfast my sister is the first to leave. She goes to catch her bus at ten past eight when I am still having my toast. Dad is the next to leave about five minutes later. He works at a food factory in an industrial estate on the outskirts of King's Lynnand has to be there at half past eight. Dad goes in the car.
